**Endpoints added:**
- GET /email/status
- GET /email/activity
- GET /email/signals
- POST /email/send
- POST /email/check

Using App Password for simplicity. OAuth2 available for production upgrade.

**TRIGGERS CONFIGURED:**

| Trigger | Pattern | Action | Priority |
|---------|---------|--------|----------|
| polymarket-notification | from:polymarket | route_to_d0t | high |
| bankr-alert | from:bankr | route_to_trading | high |
| github-notification | from:github | log_activity | medium |
| railway-alert | from:railway | route_to_r0ss | high |
| security-alert | subject:security | route_to_c0m | critical |
| trading-opportunity | subject:opportunity | evaluate_opportunity | high |

I'll see Polymarket notifications and trading signals immediately.
